name: Buggy Catastrophe
description:
Travel Through a world with multiple bugs. Kill all the bugs to win. But don't kill the fake ones (those are the citizens) if you kill the fake bugs you lose health. Also look out for fake land.

I'll be doing some more updates on this game, so feedback and rating will be really appreciated. I'll also release an android and pc version soon.
